Kirsten Gillibrand described the moment when Gabrielle Giffords opened her eyes-- referenced in Barack Obama 's memorial speech that evening-- with Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi ( D-Calif.) and Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz ( D-Fla.) in the room. will be the next speaker in the World Within Reach Speaker Series, which has also featured Colin Powell , Karl Rove , Howard Dean , and most recently, Barbara Walters . The Speaker Series is an initiative by the SA to bring engaging speakers in public affairs, entertainment, and business to the University at Albany to gain insight from their unique perspective. So far all speakers have had a political background, with the exception of Barbara Walters , a journalist. The location, time, and attendance details for the event have not yet been announced, but past
